codeTable

public String codeTable
READWRITE: Specifies the codeTable for the LeafElement. If non is specified, the LeafElement will use the codetable of the datatype that the LeafElement is created with Specifies the codeTable for the LeafElement. If non is specified, the LeafElement will use the codetable of the datatype that the LeafElement is created with

Constructor Detail

LeafElement

public LeafElement(String name,
                   String label,
                   String dataType,
                   com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer arraySize,
                   com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer length,
                   com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer precision,
                   com.conceptwave.scripting.Object constantValue)
Constructs a LeafElement instance. This acts as a dynamic leaf as well as a dynamic UI element that provides both model and UI properties for dynamic documents

Parameters:
name - A valid identifier string that represents the name of the leaf
label - A string that presents the label of the leaf. Current implementation will not support locale specific labels
dataType - A string that represents the full name of a metadata data type. If null or an invalid name, the system datatype "com.conceptwave.system.String" will be used. If the name results in a metadata object that is not a data type, an exception will be thrown
arraySize - If the leaf represents an array, specify the size of the array. if arraySize < 0, 0 will be used as the size. A 0 size will indicate that the leaf is not an array
length - - Optional. Length of the data.
precision - - Optional. Only applicable if dataType is a decimal type. Indicates the number of decimal digits to use
constantValue - - Optional. Specifies the constant value of the leaf. If a constant value is specified all instances created using the leaf will have the same value and the value is not modifiable
